issue.title: [CF 1458] Notification Animations Getting Stuck On?
issue.body:
Not sure how to describe the issue, but here goes. It seems that Animations like Activation Border get "stuck on" even when the icon that initiated the notification is no longer shown by the Meta Icon in which it triggered. When IconA triggers an Animation, and is then replaced by IconB, the Animation persists. I can find no way to tie the Animation exclusively to the Icon that triggered it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ashihana | Imported from CurseForge issue #1458 | Raw

comments.body:
Please post export string(s) of icons that this behavior can be replicated with.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
